startNewJvmIfRequired() - Static method in class com.bernardpablo.sokoban.lwjgl3.StartupHelper
Starts a new JVM if the application was started on macOS without the -XstartOnFirstThread argument.
startNewJvmIfRequired(boolean) - Static method in class com.bernardpablo.sokoban.lwjgl3.StartupHelper
Starts a new JVM if the application was started on macOS without the -XstartOnFirstThread argument.
StartupHelper - Class in com.bernardpablo.sokoban.lwjgl3
Adds some utilities to ensure that the JVM was started with the -XstartOnFirstThread argument, which is required on macOS for LWJGL 3 to function.
